traits.name: Goal-Oriented
traits.action: Set and track task milestones for a field job using SMM’s progress tracker.

traits.name: Strength
traits.description: Enhances physical and mental endurance in demanding tasks.
traits.action: Lead a physically intensive field task to showcase resilience.

traits.name: Accurate
traits.description: Ensures precision in measurements or repairs.
traits.action: Deliver a precise technical repair to highlight accuracy.

traits.name: Logical Reasoning
traits.action: Solve a technical issue on-site to showcase logical skills.

traits.name: Spatially Aware
traits.action: Map a work site layout to demonstrate spatial awareness.

traits.name: Dexterity
traits.description: Improves handling of tools or equipment.
traits.action: Perform a complex manual task to showcase dexterity.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: Boosts stamina for physically demanding roles.
traits.action: Maintain a fitness routine to sustain energy in field tasks.

traits.name: Melodic
traits.description: Enhances team morale through engaging communication.
traits.action: Use clear vocal instructions during a field operation to boost team coordination.

traits.name: Artistic Sensitivity
traits.action: Design a visually appealing field project to showcase creativity.

traits.name: Creativity
traits.action: Propose a novel approach to a field challenge to highlight creativity.

traits.name: Observational
traits.action: Identify a field hazard during a safety check to demonstrate observation.

traits.name: Problem-Solving
traits.action: Address a field equipment failure to showcase problem-solving.

traits.name: Decision-Making
traits.action: Make a critical on-site decision to demonstrate capability.

traits.name: Strategic Planning
traits.action: Plan a field operation workflow to highlight strategic skills.

traits.name: Critical Thinking
traits.action: Assess a field safety protocol to showcase critical thinking.

traits.name: Communication
traits.action: Lead a field team briefing to demonstrate communication skills.

traits.name: Teamwork
traits.action: Coordinate a team-based field task to demonstrate teamwork.

traits.name: Leadership
traits.action: Supervise a field crew to show leadership.

traits.name: Negotiation
traits.action: Negotiate equipment allocation in a mock scenario to highlight skills.

traits.name: Drive
traits.action: Pursue a challenging field project to showcase drive.

traits.name: Growth Mindset
traits.description: Encourages skill development in field work.
traits.action: Share insights from a technical training in a team meeting.

traits.name: Resilience
traits.action: Share strategies for managing field challenges with colleagues.

traits.name: Self-Efficacy
traits.action: Tackle a complex field repair to demonstrate self-efficacy.

traits.name: Intrinsic Motivation
traits.action: Share personal motivations in a field team discussion to inspire others.

traits.name: Adaptability
traits.description: Enables adjustment to dynamic field conditions.
traits.action: Adapt to a sudden field change to show flexibility.

traits.name: Time Management
traits.description: Ensures timely completion of field tasks.
traits.action: Organize a field project timeline to demonstrate time management.

traits.name: Proactiveness
traits.action: Propose a field efficiency improvement to showcase proactiveness.

traits.name: Data Analysis
traits.description: Supports field data interpretation (e.g., environmental monitoring).
traits.action: Analyze field data to highlight analytical skills.

traits.name: Programming
traits.action: Develop a simple field monitoring script to show technical skills.

traits.name: Numerical Reasoning
traits.action: Perform precise field measurements to demonstrate reasoning.

traits.name: Technical Troubleshooting
traits.action: Fix a field equipment fault to show troubleshooting skills.

traits.name: Scientific Observation
traits.action: Conduct a field observation study to highlight skills.

traits.name: Design Thinking
traits.action: Apply design thinking to optimize a field process.

traits.name: Emotional Intelligence
traits.action: Build rapport with a field crew to demonstrate emotional intelligence.

traits.name: Resistance
traits.action: Share stress management tips with a field team.

traits.name: Emotional Expression
traits.action: Express empathy during a field team briefing to build cohesion.

traits.name: Numerical Aptitude
traits.action: Perform quick on-site math to show aptitude.

traits.name: Spatial Intelligence
traits.action: Create a 3D site model to demonstrate spatial skills.

traits.name: Analytical Thinking
traits.action: Analyze field performance data to showcase analytical skills.

traits.name: Compassion
traits.description: Builds trust in community-facing field roles.
traits.action: Show compassion in a community field interaction to strengthen relations.

traits.name: Eclecticism
traits.action: Combine multiple techniques in a field task to highlight eclecticism.

traits.name: Inquisitiveness
traits.action: Share a field improvement question in a team discussion.

traits.name: Precision
traits.action: Deliver a precise field measurement to showcase precision.

traits.name: Organization
traits.action: Organize field equipment to demonstrate organizational skills.

traits.name: Responsibility
traits.action: Take ownership of a field task to highlight responsibility.

traits.name: Self-Discipline
traits.action: Maintain a disciplined field work schedule to show self-discipline.

traits.name: Agility
traits.action: Respond swiftly in a field emergency simulation to demonstrate agility.

traits.name: Assertiveness
traits.action: Confidently request field resources to showcase assertiveness.

traits.name: Talkativeness
traits.action: Engage team members in a field briefing to showcase talkativeness.

traits.name: Empathy
traits.description: Strengthens field team and community relations.
traits.action: Show empathy in a field interaction to build trust.

traits.name: Cooperation
traits.action: Collaborate on a field project to demonstrate cooperation.

traits.name: Coordination
traits.action: Coordinate a field crew task to show coordination.

traits.name: Frankness
traits.action: Provide transparent feedback during a field debrief to show frankness.

traits.name: Patience
traits.action: Demonstrate patience during a prolonged field repair to showcase composure.

traits.name: Fear Management
traits.description: Reduces anxiety in high-stakes field roles.
traits.action: Share fear management strategies in a field training session.

traits.name: Balance
traits.description: Maintains stability in demanding field roles.
traits.action: Maintain physical balance during a field task to demonstrate stability.

traits.name: Persuasive
traits.action: Deliver a persuasive pitch for field equipment to showcase skills.

traits.name: Storytelling
traits.description: Enhances field training or community engagement.
traits.action: Share a compelling field experience to inspire team members.

traits.name: Discerning
traits.action: Assess a field risk to demonstrate discernment.

traits.name: Innovative
traits.action: Propose a creative field process improvement to showcase innovation.

traits.name: Conceptual Thinking
traits.action: Explain a field process to colleagues to show conceptual skills.

traits.name: Quantitative Skills
traits.action: Calculate field metrics to demonstrate quantitative skills.

traits.name: Methodical
traits.action: Develop a field task checklist to showcase methodical skills.

traits.name: Analytic
traits.action: Analyze a field issue to demonstrate analytic skills.

traits.name: Imaginative
traits.action: Design an imaginative field solution to showcase creativity.

traits.name: Aesthetic
traits.description: Improves visual field outputs (e.g., site design).
traits.action: Create an appealing field project layout to showcase aesthetics.

traits.name: Team-Oriented
traits.action: Lead a team-based field task to demonstrate team orientation.
